category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Use all characters without restriction in user profile fields
Members of this user group can use any character in the user profile, regardless of the anti-spam restrictions.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Activates the AntiSpam Userprofile Plugin. With every new save of a user it is checked if there are not allowed characters / words in the user fields. If yes there is the option to empty these fields and to lock the user directly permanently.

What should happen to the Findings? clean only deletes the invalid characters / words from the fields, ban only blocks the user, and both locks the user and removes the characters words from the fields.
This is the text that is displayed to the user as the reason for the permanent ban.
A comma-separated list of non-ascii characters that should be allowed.
A comma-separated list of additional characters / words to block.
